00090         struct Event: public DynamicObject
00091         {
00092                 Event();
00094                 enum Type 
00095                 { 
00098                         Update,
00100                         Move, 
00103                         Down, 
00106                         Up, 
00109                         Trace, 
00112                         Untrace,
00113 
00116                         Click,
00119                         DoubleClick,
00122                         MoveLeft,
00125                         MoveRight,
00128                         MoveUp,
00131                         MoveDown,
00133                         Zoom,
00136                         SplitStart,
00139                         SplitEnd,
00142                         Split,
00145                         RotateStart,
00148                         RotateEnd,
00151                         Rotate
00152                 };
00153 
00155                 enum Flags
00156                 {
00158                         Left = 1 << 1,
00160                         Right = 1 << 2,
00162                         Middle = 1 << 3,
00164                         Ctrl = 1 << 4,
00166                         Alt = 1 << 5,
00168                         Shift = 1 << 6,
00169 
00171                         User = 1 << 16
00172                 };
00173 
00174                 static const int MaxPointSetSize = 32;
00175 
00177                 bool processed;
00178 
00180                 unsigned int sourceId;
00181         
00183                 enum Service::ServiceType serviceType;
00184 
00186                 int serviceId;
00187 
00189                 enum Type type;
00190 
00192                 unsigned int flags;
00193 
00195                 unsigned int timestamp;
00196 
00198                 Vector3f position;
00199 
00201                 Quaternion orientation;
00202 
00204                 Vector3f value;
00205 
00207                 int numberOfPoints;
00208                 int validPoints;
00209                 Vector3f pointSet[MaxPointSetSize];
00210 
00211                 // NOTE: event serialization services are used only in clustered / multidisplay systems.
00212                 // If display system building is disabled, this code can be safely excluded.
00213                 // Right now, event serialization for NetService / oinputserver and display system
00214                 // serialization (this) are implemented as separate facilities. We may think of joining them
00215                 // sometime in the future.
00216                 // ALso, this feature relies on Equalizer data streams, so it is enabled only for builds
00217                 // that support equalizer.
00218         #ifdef OMEGA_USE_DISPLAY_EQUALIZER
00219 
00220                 void serialize(co::DataOStream& os)
00221                 {
00222                         os << processed;
00223                         os << sourceId;
00224                         os << serviceType;
00225                         os << type;
00226                         os << flags;
00227                         os << timestamp;
00228                         os << position[0] << position[1] << position[2];
00229                         os << orientation.x() << orientation.y() << orientation.z() << orientation.w();
00230                         os << value[0] << value[1] << value[2];
00231                         os << validPoints;
00232                         os << numberOfPoints;
00233                         for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00234                         {
00235                                 os << pointSet[i][0] << pointSet[i][1] << pointSet[i][2];
00236                         }
00237                 }
00238 
00240                 void deserialize( co::DataIStream& is)
00241                 {
00242                         is >> processed;
00243                         is >> sourceId;
00244                         is >> serviceType;
00245                         is >> type;
00246                         is >> flags;
00247                         is >> timestamp;
00248                         is >> position[0] >> position[1] >> position[2];
00249                         is >> orientation.x() >> orientation.y() >> orientation.z() >> orientation.w();
00250                         is >> value[0] >> value[1] >> value[2];
00251                         is >> validPoints;
00252                         is >> numberOfPoints;
00253                         for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00254                         {
00255                                 is >> pointSet[i][0] >> pointSet[i][1] >> pointSet[i][2];
00256                         }
00257                 }
00258         #endif
00259                 bool isFlagSet(uint flag) const;
00260                 void setValidPoint(int pointId);
00261                 void resetValidPoints();
00262                 bool isValidPoint(int pointId) const;
00263         };
00264 
00266         inline bool Event::isFlagSet(uint flag) const
00267         { return (flags & flag) == flag; }
00268 
00270         inline void Event::resetValidPoints()
00271         { validPoints = 0; }
00272 
00274         inline void Event::setValidPoint(int pointId) 
00275         { validPoints |= (1 << pointId); }
00276 
00278         inline bool Event::isValidPoint(int pointId) const
00279         { return (validPoints & (1 << pointId)) == (1 << pointId); }
00280 
00282         inline Event::Event():
00283                 processed(false),
00284                 validPoints(0)
00285         {}
00286 
00287 }; // namespace omega
